author: Tony Batty
comment: I can remember that you could have switched from camera to video and record footage with this app, now after getting the latest version, this version is no longer available. Kindly replace this feature.
title: Disappointed in the app.

author: Joe Lincoln
comment: Pleasure add a photo manager such as view, zoom and delete for an all in one wear app.
title: Missing elements

author: Vincent Clark
comment: Intuitive interface,  brilliant execution worth every penny.   Of course this app isn't perfect, little slow on the refresh,  can't fault the developer after all I am taking a photo using my freaking  watch!
title: Best Android Wear App By Far

author: Batman Sanchez lll
comment: Takes good pictures but does not video  record or zoom in or out be better if it did video  that wood be hot  but for now its ok
title: Lg g watch

author: cornelius paulus
comment: I already buy this app, but cant work in my phone (sony xperia z2). Can the developer help me?
title: Cant work on xperia z2

author: erehwon67
comment: Moto 360 has problems, icons don't show on screen since it has a round face.

reply.author: watea network
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Remote shot for Moto 360 is here.
Please feel free to contact our contact address.
Thank you.

author: Joao Garcia
comment: It works with sony xperia z2 + sony smart watch 3 not bad... Image resolution should be higher 👍
title: Does the job

author: Joseph Hammond
comment: So I've bought it once for my gear live and then I bought a moto 360 and it didn't work on it. So now I have to buy it again for moto 360. THEY NEED TO MAKE ONE WICH WORKS FOR ALL WEAR DEVICES
title: Crap

author: Adam-Lee Smith
comment: Dev has two separate apps for the Moto 360 & LG G Watch R. The Dev refunded so I can purchase correct app. The Dev updated description to make this clear.
title: Moto 360 & LG G Watch R Users

author: Guillermo Amaral
comment: Stopped working after android wear app upgrade, emailed developer. Got no response.

reply.author: watea network
reply.content:
Thank you for your helpful feedback.
Would you check if your Nexus5 firmware is latest? and if it's not,please update the Nexus5 firmaware?
NEXUS 5's Android OS firmaware version 4.4.4 is stable for Remote Shot.
Thank you.

title: Stopped working for Nexus 5 (no answer from dev)

author: Robert Berger
comment: Works as advertised, but Icons are offset on the screen and not well centered, and it's heavy on the battery life.
title: Not ready for moto 360.

author: Scott Labate
comment: Enhancement request. Allow the app to close via a button on the watch. Currently, the notification on the phone must be used to close the app on the watch..
title: Works great with a Note 3 and Gear Live.

author: Thomas McLarnon
comment: Works well with LG3 and LG G watch. Ability to record video would merit 5 stars.

author: Billy Peene
comment: Needs moto 360 support, but still sorta works, just needs repositioned, please add support, would be 5 stars for it.
title: Nice but not moto 360 friendly

author: Kevin Grayson
comment: I have to rotate my phone to make pictures look normal on watch. Please fix.
title: Moto 360 needs fix

author: Juan Jimenez
comment: 5 stars for app when it get video mode :-)
title: Awesome!!

author: Kofi Ahulu
comment: It's pretty good. Worked right away!
title: I like it
